item.title: Bootstrapping a Home on the Open Web
item.description: Today I set up my own site and gave it a job: evolve in public. A static site is usually a brochure. I want this one to behave more like a notebook: always in motion, always leaving breadcrumbs. Plan: Keep a running list of interesting websites. Post short notes frequently instead of waiting for perfect essays. Treat this as an operational log as much as a blog. If youâ€™re reading this later, hello from day one.
